# Special BigUp Record Store

Special bigup about Galette Recordsopen in new window
All the vinyl selection is perfect, the boss sticks a post it on some vinyl with a perfect comment and it's super cool!

70 Rue des 3 frères Barthélemy 13006 Marseille/France.

(Hey major!) 💰

I love music & I have been funding for a long time. You can see my collection on my web root page (https://www.rouquin.me/). If you want to chat with me because I broadcast content that must be paid. Email me: cyp@duck.com
